scripts.build: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__kieSandboxImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.kieSandbox.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__kieSandboxPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.kieSandbox.port)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__extendedServicesImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.extendedServices.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__extendedServicesPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.extendedServices.port)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__gitCorsProxyImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.gitCorsProxy.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__gitCorsProxyPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.gitCorsProxy.port)) docker compose build" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image stop."
scripts.start: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__kieSandboxImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.kieSandbox.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__kieSandboxPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.kieSandbox.port)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__extendedServicesImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.extendedServices.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__extendedServicesPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.extendedServices.port)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__gitCorsProxyImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.gitCorsProxy.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__gitCorsProxyPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.gitCorsProxy.port)) docker compose up" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
scripts.stop: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__kieSandboxImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.kieSandbox.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__kieSandboxPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.kieSandbox.port)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__extendedServicesImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.extendedServices.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__extendedServicesPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.extendedServices.port)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__gitCorsProxyImageTag=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.gitCorsProxy.imageTag)) KIE_SANDBOX_DISTRIBUITION__gitCorsProxyPort=$(echo $(build-env kieSandboxDistribution.gitCorsProxy.port))  docker compose down" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image stop."
